field.label.author: Authors
field.label.argumentation: Does the contribution provide a convincing argument to address the research question?
field.label.clarity: Are the central question and the research/analysis objectives of the contribution clearly outlined?
field.label.innovation: Does the contribution offer a new interpretation or shed new light on the subject?
field.label.interdisciplinarity: Does the contribution take an interdisciplinary approach?
field.label.interest: Is the contribution of interest to the target community of Aktioun Nohaltegkeet?
field.label.methodology: Does the author use an appropriate, reasonable method to address the subject?
field.label.originality: Is the contribution notable for its innovation and originality?
field.label.pertinence: Do the selected resources make a useful contribution to the argument?
field.label.references: Are the references cited in the footnotes appropriate, relevant and up to date?
field.label.review.status.bounce: Improvements needed before publication. To be submitted again.
field.label.review.status.refusal: Refused. Do not consider for publication.
field.label.structure: Does the contribution have a meaningful structure and section headings?
field.label.thematic: Is the contribution related to the topics covered by Aktioun Nohaltegkeet?
field.label.title: Title
field.label.upload.title: Add a title

state.publications.no-poverty.descriptio: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
state.publications.zero-hunger.descripti: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
state.publications.good-health-well-bein: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
state.publications.quality-education.des: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
state.publications.gender-equality.descr: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
state.publications.clean-water-sanitatio: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
state.publications.affordable-clean-ener: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
state.publications.decent-work-economic-: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
state.publications.industry-innovation-i: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
state.publications.reduced-inequality.de: Reduce inequality within and among countries
state.publications.sustainable-cities-co: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
state.publications.responsible-consumpti: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
state.publications.climate-actions.descr: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
state.publications.life-below-water.desc: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
state.publications.life-on-land.descript: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
state.publications.piece-justice-strong-: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
state.publications.partnerships-for-the-: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
copyright.checkbox.label: I am the copyright owner of the picture or have the permission of the copyright owner to share the picture
copyright.checkbox.text: If you did not take the picture yourself, it most likely is protected by copyright and you are not allowed to upload it. Alternatively, you can upload a creative commons picture. For more information on this, you can check our guide for authors.
writing.help: We recommend new authors to have a look at our guide for authors. It contains useful information that can help you create and structure your article.
